participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: creative and nurturing, loves to express herself through baking and crafting.
participant_1.background: i love to bake cookies. knitting is my passion. the county wide bake sale is where i feel most at home. i'm scared of dying. i've a dogs.

participant_2.name: Jake

participant_2.background: i am in the third grade. i love to go to disney world every year. i love to sing songs from the movie frozen. mickey mouse is my favorite character. i play with my friends on the playground.
